feed.title: little pig
feed.subtitle: Self-discipline, in order to the People who love you, also for yourself!

entry.title: Someone has exposed BILIBILI backend code on Github
entry.summary: Someone has exposed BILIBILI backend code on Github. I know this thing after one day. When I hear about this, I'm shocked. When people do something like this, either this is a problem with the people's character, or this is a problem with the company. In either case, the ultimate winner of this event is Github. Like 996.icu.
